branchCategory.name: Modular for FRL
branchCategory.description: <p>Pneumatic switches mount with an FRL assembly, providing a signal output when a setpoint is reached.</p>

branchItem.name: IS10M, Pressure Switch with FRL Spacer, AC/DC, Analog Indicator
branchItem.description: <p>IS10M is a pressure switch with a linear mechanical set point indicator, for modular installation with SMC's FRL units.  The switch housing attaches to a spacer that clamps inline with the FRL.  The housing assembly includes a reed switch activated by a piston-mounted magnet.  A screw adjusts the spring loading the piston to set the switch point.  Two pressure ranges are available, along with MPa and psi units on the setting scale.  The spacer can be selected to mount to 5 different FRL body sizes.  IS10M is CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP40 enclosure rating.</p>

branchItem.name: IS10E Pressure Switch with Female Pipe Adapter, AC/DC, Analog Indicator
branchItem.description: <p>ISE10E is a pressure switch with a linear mechanical set point indicator, for modular installation with SMC's FRL units.  The switch housing attaches to a threaded block for mounting inline with the FRL.  The housing assembly includes a reed switch activated by a piston-mounted magnet.  A screw adjusts the spring loading the piston to the switch point.  Two pressure ranges are available, along with MPa and psi units on the setting scale.  The adapter block has 5 port sizes, in Rc, NPT or G thread to mount to 3 FRL body sizes.  IS10E is CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP40 enclosure rating.</p>
